prefix.description: The prefix for the vocabulary, must be a valid qualified name (#x9 | #xA | #xD | #x20).

iri.description: The Iri namespace for the vocabulary.

account.description: The name of the account in TriplyDB.com that publishes the vocabulary.

dataset.description: The name of the dataset in TriplyDB.com, if this is different from the job alias.

objectName.description: If the vocabulary alias cannot act as an object name in TypeScript, specify a different object name (eg 'void' => 'VoID').

defaultSnippets.label: New vocabulary
defaultSnippets.description: Adds a placeholder for a new vocabulary definition.
